data.name: Super Bernie World - Donate to the devs
data.detailed_description:
Check out our next game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1325260/Kitsune_Tails/


About the Game

This DLC is intended purely as a donation to the developers of Super Bernie World. All money goes to the developers, not Bernie Sanders' campaign. Purchasing this DLC will not change or add anything to the base game.
data.about_the_game: This DLC is intended purely as a donation to the developers of Super Bernie World. All money goes to the developers, not Bernie Sanders' campaign. Purchasing this DLC will not change or add anything to the base game.
data.short_description: [Donation DLC] Join Bernie's movement and transform the United States in this free retro 2D platformer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Super Bernie World - Donate to the devs
